feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Removed WithoutOverlapping middleware and refactored to use SkipIfBatchCancelled by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2030
  • [Bug] Fixed server name filter by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2031
  • Release v1.2.2 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2032

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fixed panel reverting to light mode by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2036
  • [Bug] Fixed models are not being pruned when enabled by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2037
  • [Chore] Removed polling config by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2038
  • Release v1.2.3 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2039

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Removed spa mode by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2041
  • add: Italian (it_IT) localization added by @Trainax in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2048
  • [Chore] Remove version checker by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2053
  • [Chore] Removed docker dependabot updates by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2072
  • Laravel 11.43.2 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2068
  • [Chore] 2025-02-23 dependency updates by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2073
  • Release v1.2.4 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2074

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.3...v1.2.4

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fix systemchecker in SpeedtestTrackerVersionProvider by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2076
  • Release v1.2.5 by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2079

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.4...v1.2.5

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.3.0
entry.content:
Breaking Change

  • In Laravel 12 MAIL_ENCRYPTION has been renamed to MAIL_SCHEME, make sure to update your environment variables with this release if you're using the mail notification driver.

What's New

  • [Feature] Tests and a CI pipeline by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2101

What's Changed

  • Laravel 12.x Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2099
  • Bump esbuild and vite by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2100
  • Release v1.3.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2102

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.5...v1.3.0
